currEvents.title: FITC Toronto 2019
currEvents.description: FITC Toronto is a globally recognized industry event showcasing the best the world has to offer in design, digital development, media and innovation in creative technologies â€“ its three days and nights of presentations, parties, installations and performances that unite and transform the industry.

currEvents.title: Senior Night
currEvents.description: The year is coming to an end, and it is time to bid seniors goodbye. This last event for the semester, is all about the seniors bidding you guys farewell in NMC style. As per NMC tradition, seniors will be showing their less than pretty creations from the years past. Come join us as we roast and judge our beginnings, but also celebrate how far we have come.
